title:
Ultra-dispersive resonator readout of a quantum-dot qubit using
  longitudinal coupling
authors:
Benjamin Harpt, J. Corrigan, Nathan Holman, Piotr Marciniec, D.
  Rosenberg, D. Yost, R. Das, Rusko Ruskov, Charles Tahan, William D. Oliver,
  R. McDermott, Mark Friesen, and M. A. Eriksson
abstract:
We perform readout of a quantum-dot hybrid qubit coupled to a superconducting
resonator through a parametric, longitudinal interaction mechanism. Our
experiments are performed with the qubit and resonator frequencies detuned by
$\sim$10 GHz, demonstrating that longitudinal coupling can facilitate
semiconductor qubit operation in the 'ultra-dispersive' regime of circuit
quantum electrodynamics.
